org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.converters

Class HostConfigConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.converters.HostConfigConverter

  • public final class HostConfigConverter
extends Object
    A collection of utility methods to convert Business objects to their corresponding ObjectNode and vice-versa.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode businessToNode(Business hostConfig)
      Converts the given Business object into an ObjectNode.
      static List<RoleDefault.ROLE> getRoles(String hostName)
      Returns the requested host's list of roles on the server.
      static Business nodeToNewBusiness(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode object)
      Converts the given ObjectNode into a Business object.
      static Business nodeToUpdatedBusiness(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode object, Business oldBusiness)
      Returns the given Business object updated with the values defined in the ObjectNode parameter.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • businessToNode

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode businessToNode(Business hostConfig)
        Converts the given Business object into an ObjectNode.
        Parameters:
        hostConfig - the HostConfig object to convert
        Returns:
        the converted ObjectNode

      • nodeToNewBusiness

        public static Business nodeToNewBusiness(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode object)
        Converts the given ObjectNode into a Business object.
        Parameters:
        object - the ObjectNode to convert
        Returns:
        the corresponding HostConfig object
        Throws:
        RestErrorException - if the given ObjectNode does not represent a Business object

      • nodeToUpdatedBusiness

        public static Business nodeToUpdatedBusiness(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode object,
                                             Business oldBusiness)
        Returns the given Business object updated with the values defined in the ObjectNode parameter. All fields missing from the ObjectNode parameter will stay unchanged in the returned Business object.
        Parameters:
        object - the ObjectNode to convert.
        oldBusiness - the Business object to update.
        Returns:
        the updated Business object
        Throws:
        RestErrorException - if the given ObjectNode does not represent a Business object

      • getRoles

        public static List<RoleDefault.ROLE> getRoles(String hostName)
        Returns the requested host's list of roles on the server.
        Parameters:
        hostName - the desired host's name
        Returns:
        the host's list of roles
        Throws:
        InternalServerErrorException - if an unexpected error occurred
